text: There will be no power supply in the following areas from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. on January 6 due to maintenance work on the Thedavur sub-station in Gangavalli block: Thedavur; Aanaiyampatti; Punarvasal; Veeraganur; East Rajapalayam; Pinnanur; Naduvalur Kanavaikadu; Gangavalli and the surrounding areas.
title: Power shutdown
